page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is one hotel and a guest house in the area.The hotel is used by holiday makers and visiting business men.The guest house by Coulport workers.These two places give employ- ment to school leavers. There are two builders who repair old houses as well as building new ones.They have apprentices who are learning the trade.There is also a joiner and a plumber who work in the village. Although there are these small employers it is obvious that the major source of jobs is the M.O.D.This means that if the bases were to close there would be very high unemployment here. The shops which are just outside our area also give work but many people go to the supermarkets in Helensburgh and Clydebank for major shopping
